channel.title: I need an easy favor...wont take 5 min
channel.description:
i need someone to download and install this microsoft zune theme and then i need all the files put into a zip file or even just uploaded here...
the link is here: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=75078
Im on a school computer and can't install it but i want the theme file...
please help me!!
thanks ahead of time.

item.title: I need an easy favor...wont take 5 min
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

lol… no they go into %windir%[b]resources[/b]\themes

i can’t write anything into the files in the widows directory… nothing can’t edit and save or i can’t save as or even drag and drop… i don’t think the cmd command ‘copy’ works either.

im trying to use a tool that i can install on my flash drive to run to edit some settings on the computer. some registry keys can’t even be edited and i can’t create new keys sometimes either. i managed to make a bat file on the computer to access c:\ and regedit but they have completely blocked run and the control panel… and i can’t right click on the desktop and pull up properties. im hoping they left desk.cpl alone…odds are they didn’t…

any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: I need an easy favor...wont take 5 min

item.title: I need an easy favor...wont take 5 min
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:6, topic:173477”][quote author=deoxys505 link=topic=233790.msg2001480#msg2001480 date=1200599928]
i can’t copy anything into windir or the c:\ drive but if its c:\asdjfkhsdkjlfh\asdfjkhf i can…

i can’t load theme files either now… it sucks…
[/quote]

Last time I checked, themes go into C:\Windows\System32\Themes.[/quote]I tried that didn’t seem to work… I even manually tried to search for the theme folder…

Read full topic

item.title: I need an easy favor...wont take 5 min
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

To be honest, if you don’t have access to run the installer. Then I doubt you’ll be able to copy the files to a system folder. Try Styler, it’s an amazing program.It allows you to use other visual styles than Microsoft Windows Branded styles. And to make it a better experience, google ViOrb. It places a replacement Vista Orb on the Startbar, and replaces the old start button, so with a Zune theme, and ViOrb, it’s a close match to Vista.

Read full topic
item.source: I need an easy favor...wont take 5 min

item.title: I need an easy favor...wont take 5 min
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

cause… i have 45min to do nothing… and im bored. they got a lot of stuff blocked, and im having to use my knowledge to get around it…

like making bat files to start the c:\ drive and regedit… and my only proxy site that worked went offline permanetly…the only thing we can do is customize our computers… plus its our first day in this class… im really bored but thanks for trying to help…

btw do you happen to have

LesMSIerables

its a program that lets you extract .msi files…

Read full topic
